The coins you collect from playing any of the different mini-games can be spent on purchasing new clothing, body colors, hairstyles or even beards for your Moy. You can also spend coins by decorating your house, buying fishes for the aquarium, new animals for your zoo, buying ingredients for baking your own desserts and much more.

The game supports multitouch features, allowing multiple players to simultaneously interact with their own characters on the same screen.

Huge variety of clothing items and accessories allow full character customization and if that‚Äôs not enough be sure to visit an enchantment lab at the Witch House! Want to go big? No problem! Visit Dragon Playground where you can create and magically imbue your very own dragons! Play and ride your creations and when everyone get‚Äôs tired, get some sleep in highly customisable and cute draconic houses!

EXPLORE, EXPAND AND DISCOVER LIMITLESS PLAY
While playing, kids will be able to move characters and objects from one island to another. This feature greatly expands gameplay options and encourages exploration and experimentation.
